name: F*ck the evolution
description:
Jam Game, made in 36 hours.

LD24 Jam Entry - August 24th-27th 2012

~

This is the story of a dinosaur, who stole Jules Vernes's Time Machine, travel to Russia to stole an AK47, got back to his time, and waited to fight against evolution. (And yes, he has arms! If not, how could he grab his kalash?)
You have to survive as long as you can during different stages of the human being evolution.

Fight, fight, and survive as long as you can!

~

I am the artist of this project, please enjoy the art.
